price: Ayo ni amagambo ya Allah tugusomera mu kuri (yewe Muhamadi), kandi Allah ntajya ahuguza ibiremwa.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡمٗا لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wamā al-lahu yurīdu ẓul'man lil'ʿālamīna
